>
[Halcyon Spellcasting Adept](/Feats.aspx?ID=1122) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 105 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Halcyon Speaker](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=30)

**Prerequisites**
[Halcyon Spellcasting Initiate](/Feats.aspx?ID=1118); master in either [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) or [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10), expert in the other

</column>

---

You refine your halcyon magic. You gain two common 4th-level halcyon spells and two 5th-level halcyon spells. You also gain a 4th-level halcyon spell slot and a 5th-level halcyon spell slot. Your proficiency rank in either arcane or primal spell DCs and spell attack rolls advances from trained to expert.

<title level="2">Halcyon Spellcasting Adept leads to...</title>
[Halcyon Spellcasting Sage](/Feats.aspx?ID=1124)
